title: 'An important player with special characteristics' - could Bergwijn's match-winning cameo resurrect Spurs career?
description: Dutch striker's match-winning late cameo gives Spurs food for thought on a forward who appeared to be heading for the exit.

title: Jozef Puska, 31, charged with murder of Ashling Murphy
description: A man appears at a special court in the Republic of Ireland charged with the murder of Ashling Murphy.

title: Netball Quad Series: England lose 58-46 to Australia in final
description: England suffer a 58-46 loss to Australia and miss out on their first ever Quad Series trophy at London's Copper Box.

title: Egypt reach Afcon last 16 with win over Sudan
description: Egypt edge past Sudan to finish second in Group D and qualify for the last 16 of the Africa Cup of Nations.

title: Nigeria top group after cruising to win over Guinea-Bissau
description: Nigeria beat Guinea-Bissau to become the only side at the Africa Cup of Nations to win all three group games.

title: Ukraine tension: Blinken says Russia could attack at short notice
description: Moscow denies any plan to attack Ukraine and says US support for the country is a threat to Russia.

title: Defecting was most difficult decision - Wakeford
description: The ex-Tory MP says he had "many sleepless nights" over moving to Labour, but it was the "right decision".

title: Christian Wakeford's long walk to defection
description: The MP's journey from the Tories to Labour follows ideological doubts and a lengthy wooing process.

title: In the name of God go, David Davis tells UK PM
description: The former cabinet minister joins calls for Boris Johnson to stand down, as a Tory MP defects to Labour.

title: Covid: Face mask rules and Covid passes to end in England
description: Working from home guidance is also ending as England reverts to "Plan A", Boris Johnson says.

title: Shrewsbury MP Daniel Kawczynski suspended for one day over bullying
description: Daniel Kawczynski, Shrewsbury's Conservative MP, is sanctioned for undermining his own apology.

title: 'We hope that she's doing OK' - leading players call for information on Peng's wellbeing
description: Victoria Azarenka, Naomi Osaka and Ashleigh Barty call for more information on Chinese player Peng Shuai's wellbeing.

title: Ben John: Extremist ordered to read books is jailed

title: Brewdog flouted US laws over beer imports
description: Scottish beer giant shipped hundreds of kegs of beer to America which had not been legally approved.

title: Working-from-home guidance shift 'may not save my shop'
description: End of work-from-home guidance a boost for hospitality, while nightclubs welcome scrapping of Covid passes.

title: Surging food prices push inflation to 30-year high
description: The UK's cost of living surged by 5.4% in the 12 months to December, hitting its highest level since 1992.

title: Unilever says it will not increase £50bn bid for rival
description: Consumer goods giant Unilever says it will not sweeten its bid for the healthcare arm of GlaxoSmithKline.

title: In pictures: Snow falls in Algeria's Sahara Desert
description: The ice crystals leave stunning patterns in the sands of the Sahara, the world's largest hot desert.

title: What high inflation means - in 90 seconds
description: The BBC's consumer affairs correspondent, Colletta Smith, breaks it down.

title: Inflation: Peterborough community cafe customers feel the pinch
description: What does the latest rise in the cost of living mean for those already struggling to make ends meet?

title: Gaspard Ulliel: Moon Knight actor dies aged 37 after ski accident
description: Gaspard Ulliel, who features in the upcoming Marvel TV series, died after an accident on the Alps.

title: Tonga volcano: New images reveal scale of damage after tsunami
description: Trees are torn down and buildings ripped apart following Saturday's tsunami triggered by a volcano.

title: LGBT military ban: 'I was marched off RAF base for being gay'
description: A man who was discharged from the military for being gay tells how it inspired his fight for change.

title: Children's show Fraggle Rock returns after 33 years
description: Classic children's show Fraggle Rock has been revived for Apple TV+, 33 years after the last series was made.

title: Covid in schools: Inquiry launched to find 100,000 pupils absent in England
description: England's children's commissioner says she will "go out and find" those not on school rolls.

title: Facebook Messenger: The battle over end-to-end encryption
description: The battle-lines have been drawn - but what is end-to-end encryption and why is it controversial?

title: Joe Biden one year on: Has the United States become ungovernable?
description: A president who promised to unite the country is unable to bring his own party together.

title: Bono: U2's name and songs make me cringe
description: The band's frontman says he gets "embarrassed" by his voice, and also isn't fond of their name.

description: Those aged 18 to 25 have never experienced inflation before in their lives - how are they coping?

title: Conservative MPs moving against Boris Johnson are 'like a jilted lover', says MP
description: Boris Johnson faces a loss of faith among newer MPs - but the PM's supporters insist he can survive.

description: A Royal Society report recommends against censoring scientific misinformation online.

description: Former BBC reporter Mohamed Moalimu is recovering after being targeted on Sunday in Somalia.

title: Winter Olympics 2022: China sells Xinjiang as a winter sports hub
